definition: Yayuncun neighborhood of Beijing
Asia/Asian/Taiwan pr. [Ya3]
second/next to/inferior/sub-/Taiwan pr. [ya3]
to move/to transport/to use/to apply/fortune/luck/fate
village

sentences.english: An Asian Games decoration with its mascot is displayed in front of the media village in the Asian Games Town.
sentences.chinese: 亞運村媒體村前展示着一個亞運會的吉祥物裝飾。

sentences.english: We are finding the way to Guangzhou Asian Games Village, Can't you tell me ?
sentences.chinese: 我們正在找路回亞運村呢，你可以幫我們嗎？

sentences.english: The Asian Games Village Automobile Exchange is the biggest car dealership in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 亞運村汽車交易所是北京最大的汽車經銷代理商。

sentences.english: Finally no alternative but to choose and buy a high volume of residential.
sentences.chinese: 最後沒辦法，只好又到亞運村買了容積率很高的住宅。

sentences.english: The company locates on Asian Sports Village, a downtown area in Beijing, next to the landmark Bird's Nest.
sentences.chinese: 公司在北京繁華地區亞運村，毗鄰地標型建築鳥巢。

definition: Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
